getName

public java.lang.String getName()
Gets the name of the scenario. Each scenario should have a unique name, so that it can be used to identify them.

the name of the scenario, as a String object

colorFromText

protected java.awt.Color colorFromText(java.lang.String color)
Converts a named-color into a Color object. Named-colors can be either a full-name standard color such as "blue" or "green" or a RGB hex color prefixed by a sharp, like #FF6633.

Parameters:
color - The color as a String.
